PUBLISHING AGREEMENT TO WRITE A BOOK FEATURING IMAGES AND EXTENDED CAPTIONS RELATED TO PERSONAL LIFE AND WORK AS A US SENATOR WITH INTENT TO PUBLISH AND DISTRIBUTE FOR PUBLIC RESALE.  ALL CONTRACT ROYALTIES ARE ASSIGNED TO THE STATEWIDE PUBLIC CHARITY: GOOD SHEPHERD FOOD BANK OF AUBURN MAINE.  PUBLISHING AGREEMENT IS ATTACHED.
